search.query: sourcetype=cisco:ios filename=* filename_line=* | rex field=message_text "(?<src_mac>[0-9a-fA-F]{2}:[0-9a-fA-F]{2}:[0-9a-fA-F]{2}:[0-9a-fA-F]{2}:[0-9a-fA-F]{2})" | rex field=message_text mode=sed "s/([[:xdigit:]]{1,2}:){5}[[:xdigit:]]{1,2}/XX:XX:XX:XX:XX/g" | stats latest(_time) AS _time, count by dvc,facility,mnemonic,src_mac,message_text,vendor_explanation | sort -count | table _time dvc facility mnemonic src_mac message_text vendor_explanation count
